job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Required skills:

  • 8+ years of hands-on experience programming in Java.
  • Must be passionate about software development and delivering great work.
  • Experience with Spring Framework.
  • Strong understanding of OOP, design patterns, clean code and SOA architecture.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and distributed systems.
  • Ideally looking for a Lead developer who has experience in leading projects/making architectural decisions for the development projects.


Top skills:

  • Java and Spring is must
  • Restful API
  • Design patterns, design principles, strong understanding of OOP
